questions.question: Which of the following recursive formula can be used to find the factorial of a number?

explanations.c: fact(n)=n*fact(n-1) canbe used to find the factorial of a number

questions.question: THe time complexity of recursive implementation to find the factorial of a number is ______

explanations.a: Time complexity of recursive impelementation to find factorial is n as we iterate through a loop n times with O(1) inside the loop

questions.question: Which of the following properties of the recursive function is/are correct?

answers.a: Recursion helps to create a short code
answers.b: Recursion is effective where terms are generated successively to compute a value
answers.c: Recursion is useful for branching process

explanations.d: All three are true about recursion

questions.question: Which of the following is the base case in recursive implementation to find the factorial of a number?

explanations.d: factorial of 1 is 1 so if(n==1 ) return 1 is the base case

questions.question: The data structure used to implement recursive function calls _____

explanations.d: stack is used to implement recursive function calls
